channel.title: This Made Me Angy; Marine/Starbucks story
channel.description:
ok b4 i start i would like to say a few things one bieng that the only reason this story made me made was because my mom went to iraq for war for a total for 3.5 years, btw true story, ok some people may already knopw some may not but soldiers overseas often right letters to big companys like startbucks for example well they usally say somthing around the lines of "hello i cannot get your products here can you help me and my fellow soldies out" usally longer but recently i heard a true story from a marine and he wrote to starbuck asking for products and heres what starbucks wrote
we do not support or war or anybody in it
its just a pice but saying they dont support the war is one thing but saying they dont support anybody in it?! this made me mad and aout 30 other people who have heard it, what to you think about it?

item.title: This Made Me Angy; Marine/Starbucks story
item.dc:creator: @bumblescum bumblescum
item.description:
@bumblescum wrote:

[quote=“thiefmn6092, post:8, topic:22656”][quote author=mvp566 link=topic=34587.msg412772#msg412772 date=1162842730]
ok b4 i start i would like to say a few things one bieng that the only reason this story made me made was because my mom went to iraq for war for a total for 3.5 years, btw true story,

ok some people may already knopw some may not but soldiers overseas often right letters to big companys like startbucks for example well they usally say somthing around the lines of “hello i cannot get your products here can you help me and my fellow soldies out” usally longer but recently i heard a true story from a marine and he wrote to starbuck asking for products and heres what starbucks wrote

we do not support or war or anybody in it

its just a pice but saying they dont support the war is one thing but saying they dont support anybody in it?! this made me mad and aout 30 other people who have heard it, what to you think about it?
[/quote]

Great job on the bullshit kid.[/quote]
The story is quite real, though fabricated.

In fact, read about it months ago.

Read full topic

item.title: This Made Me Angy; Marine/Starbucks story
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

I personally think that it doesn’t matter… I mean… my dad is a vietnam veteran and got three purple hearts, and when he gets denied stuff we don’t go crazy… It’s Starbucks right under the US constitution to have their own oppinion, and they’re just excercising it.

Read full topic

ARGH!!!Thanks to you now I don’t know what I’ll do with this cup a cofee(sry bout spellin)!!!I’ll probably put it in da fridge and drink it tommorow wen I forget about this thread…yawn…must…get…caffine…lol…just…kidding…
lol!
